name: decian-cybersecurity-assessment
description: Comprehensive cybersecurity risk assessment platform with web dashboard and distributed Go-based agents

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:agents
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:agents
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../agents && go mod tidy

author: Decian
